DOC.criteria: A physicianconfirmed diagnosis MS Exercise 90 minute per week Pregnant Metabolic cardiopulmonary disease put patient high risk engage home exercise program ( patient control diabetes high blood pressure still consider eligible ) Four fall past 6 month Be able walk 25 foot without cane walker Severe cognitive deficit A condition besides MS lead hospitalization past year
